text: The best among you are those who learn the Qurâ€™an and teach it.
Do not waste water, even if you were at a running stream.
The strong man is not the one who can overpower others. The strong man is the one who controls himself when angry.
Kindness is a mark of faith, and whoever is not kind has no faith.
Do not envy one another, and do not turn away from one another. Be, O servants of Allah, brothers.
The most beloved of people to Allah are those who are most beneficial to people.
Smiling in the face of your brother is charity.
He who does not show mercy to others will not be shown mercy.
Make things easy, do not make them difficult. Bring glad tidings and do not drive people away.
